name: cloud-trainee-manager
description: A cloud-based application for managing and tracking training programs, designed to facilitate communication between trainees, advisors, and managers. The application features include meetings management, notifications, emailing, searching, and advertising. It supports both SQL and NoSQL databases and tracks all user activities with date and time. The application includes models for trainees, advisors, managers, meeting requests, scheduled meetings, notifications, training programs, general advice, payments, attendance, appointments, and documents. It is built using Node.js and is scalable, secure, and efficient.
author: Mohammed Abuteir
